title: Phase 1: Core MVP — Working local dashboard
description: Scaffold Next.js 14 project, build bv robot protocol wrapper, create Dashboard and Kanban board views. Acceptance: can point at any Beads-enabled repo, dashboard loads real data, Kanban renders correctly, auto-refreshes via polling, works on localhost:3000.

title: Project scaffold — Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind, App Router
description: Initialize Next.js 14 with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS. Create the full project directory structure: app/, components/, lib/. Set up .env.local with BEADS_PROJECT_PATH.

title: bv-client.ts — Robot protocol command wrapper
description: Create lib/bv-client.ts that executes bv --robot-* commands via child_process, parses JSON output, handles errors, caches with short TTL, falls back to reading .beads/issues.jsonl if bv unavailable.

title: TypeScript interfaces for Beads/bv data models
description: Create lib/types.ts with TypeScript interfaces for all bv robot protocol JSON responses: RobotInsights, RobotPlan, RobotPriority, RobotDiff, RobotRecipes. Also BeadsIssue interface matching .beads/issues.jsonl schema.

title: API routes — /api/issues, /api/insights, /api/priority, /api/diff
description: Create Next.js API routes that proxy to bv-client.ts. GET /api/issues (robot-plan), GET /api/insights (robot-insights), GET /api/priority (robot-priority), GET /api/diff?since=REF (robot-diff). Graceful error handling with proper HTTP status codes.

title: Dashboard page — summary cards, What's Next, issue list, priority alerts
description: Build the home page with: summary cards (Total/Open/InProgress/Blocked/Closed counts), What's Next panel (highest impact actionable task), sortable issue table (ID, Title, Status, Priority, Type, Blocked By), priority alerts (divergence warnings). Auto-refresh every 30s via React Query.

title: Kanban board page — columns, issue cards, detail panel
description: Build Kanban board with 4 columns: Open, In Progress, Blocked, Closed. Issue cards show type icon, ID, title, priority flames, assignee, dependency count. Cards sorted by priority within columns. Empty columns collapse. Click card to expand slide-in detail panel.

title: Layout and styling — sidebar nav, dark theme, responsive
description: Sidebar navigation with Dashboard, Board, Insights links. Dark theme by default (developer aesthetic). Responsive layout for laptop screens. Consistent status colours: Open=Green, InProgress=Amber, Blocked=Red, Closed=Grey.

title: Shared UI components — IssueCard, StatusBadge, PriorityIndicator
description: Build reusable components: IssueCard.tsx (card for kanban/list), StatusBadge.tsx (colored status pill), PriorityIndicator.tsx (priority flames/level), KanbanColumn.tsx (column wrapper). Keep components under 200 lines each.
